description: This file defines a React functional component named ConfirmDialog, which renders a modal confirmation dialog with customizable title, message, and callback actions for confirm and cancel.

methods.name: ConfirmDialog({ open, title = 'Confirm', message, onConfirm, onCancel })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a modal dialog for user confirmation, displaying title and message, with Cancel and Delete buttons wired to callback functions.

ctags.name: ConfirmDialog
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ConfirmDialog({ open, title = 'Confirm', message, onConfirm, onCancel })/
